website_summaries.verdict: A versatile cube bookcase that can be hung on a wall or placed on a floor.
pros: Contemporary design makes the cube bookcase a great fit just about anywhere
Comes in multiple finish options to match a living space's decor
Can be used on the floor or hung on the wall
cons: More expensive than comparable cube bookcases

customer_reviews.title: NOT IKEA
customer_reviews.text: Not an IKEA shelf. It was better homes and gardens. The shelf itself is fine. Just mad about the false advertising!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Great kids tv stand
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my teen daughter’s room as we got her a tv for her birthday. A 32 in fits perfect on top. Very sturdy and well made. Easy to put together. Complaint is that on amazon it costs twice as much as IKEA. But ikea isn’t shipping or delivering so here we are... paying more.
customer_reviews.author: jeanius

customer_reviews.title: Good unit for storing records
customer_reviews.text: A bit of difficulty putting this unit together due to one of the pre- drilled holes being mal- aligned. Otherwise it's a nice little shelving unit - perfect for our records.
customer_reviews.author: C. Emry

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and provides book storage for my nightstand reading. The design would be helped by triangular braces (4) to stabilize the sides and the top and bottom shelf. They could be painted white to go with the shelfs.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cefola

customer_reviews.title: Not really white
customer_reviews.text: I like Ikea stuff, but this unit really wasn't white compared to most other items I have. I did have to cut down the length of some of the pegs, but that sees to be the norm with Ikea stuff. I'd get it again, especially considering the alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Give It To Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Easy to put together. Love it. Great for storage in a kid’s room without taking up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. But It has some defects but because of where we live, it was difficult to return. It still works so we are still using it.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Great but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got a solid shelf--just wish I had purchased directly from IKEA as this was far more expensive!
customer_reviews.author: S. Drexler

customer_reviews.title: amazingly strong
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, I could sit on it if I wanted. The price is way better on ikea site though, wish I had known that before I paid almost 3 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, perfect for large amounts of storage in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne M. Costigan

customer_reviews.title: Shelving
customer_reviews.text: Great product - sturdy, fairly easy to put together. However, the product arrived damaged, with 2 significant dents that are visible.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality , sturdy, looks like a much more expensive piece of furniture...I am very pleased. I also bought the eight cube model and have it in the living room as a TV stand/ bookcase, everyone comments on how nice it looks! Very satsidied with this purchase....
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: Great shelving
customer_reviews.text: Great shelving for kids play room - so sad that IKea discontinued, but glad I found it on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good for record storage
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect shape. Easy to assemble. Sturdy and good for storage of records and books. More expensive then offered originally by Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: It was amazing and she constantly received compliments about it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shelf from Ikea last year and used it in my daughter's college dorm room with colorful milk crates. It was amazing and she constantly received compliments about it. Not hard to put together and EXTREMELY strong! She put additional milk crates with a shelf on top of this unit AND added more baskets on top of that. Added tremendous amounts of room in her dorm room and she is using it over the summer in her room at home. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Momma Says

customer_reviews.title: item pictured is not what you will get
customer_reviews.text: Just so you know, the pictured item is not an Kallux it is a model that is not made anymore, the expedit.
customer_reviews.author: EMR

customer_reviews.title: Great price and super shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and they've been such a huge help in organizing! Great price and super shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Alma M.

customer_reviews.title: What a ripoff..
customer_reviews.text: These things are like $25-$30 directly from IKEA. Someone's trying to rip you off.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: IKEA KALLAX shelving unit, 30 3/8x30 3/8"", White
product_meta.description: Standing or lying, against the wall or to divide the room – KALLAX series is eager to please and will adapt to your taste, space, budget and needs. Fine tune with drawers, shelves, boxes and inserts.
feature_bullets: Choose whether you want to hang it on the wall or stand it on the floor
Wipe clean using a damp cloth and a mild cleaner Wipe dry with a clean cloth

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars43 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
